metadata.title: CVE-2016-2825 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Mozilla Firefox before 47.0 allows remote attackers to bypass the SameOrigin Policy and modify the location.host property via an invalid data:URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '47.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
